title: Center For Media, Arts and Performance Gift Fund
description: To provide support for the Center for Media, Arts and Performance (CMAP) including programs and performances, operations, and/or equipment at the ATLAS Institute at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide support for the Center for Media, Arts and Performance (CMAP) including programs and performances, operations, and/or equipment at the ATLAS Institute at the University of Colorado Boulder.
